Description:
APPEALING PICTURESQUE COTTAGE!!!
Imagine finding a gorgeous cottage with instant street appeal and only a short stroll to the beach .... You would be pretty lucky yeah!!!!
Up for sale in the growing coastal town of Grantville is this well-kept 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home that will delight upon inspection. The paved driveway, full length verandah and carport make unloading the groceries easy in any weather shading the entrance over summer and keeping you dry in winter. The inviting feature leadlight look front door leads into a large living and meals area with a cosy wood heater and floor to ceiling windows that lets in the natural light to allow for looking over the low maintenance gardens. Step up into the hallway which offers 3 bedrooms , good size master with en suite and a modern family bathroom. Easy care carpet and floating floors add to the appeal making this property an ideal family home. At the other end is an open plan kitchen with electric stovetop, oven and plenty of overhead cupboards, pot drawers and a wide island bench with extra storage and a split-system heating/cooling air conditioner that flows down to the meals area. The kitchen overlooks a fabulous family room which has a space saving European laundry complete with sink and bench ideally tucked away. The family room also has beautiful French doors that open out to a delightful backyard with established plants, paved area with brick bbq perfect for those entertaining days. The property is fully fenced with an extra front area for keeping the children or pets safely in. Only minutes to the local group of shops offering permanent doctor, chemist, ambulance depot, newsagency, bank, cafes, community centre and great playground. There is a v-line and school bus services close by. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway and also approx. 25 minutes to Phillip Island and major shopping centre.
The property is one to inspect if you just want to move in relax and enjoy.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
Perfect first home or investment in quiet country location
Properties like this don't come on the market often and this home is ideal for those searching a true lifestyle home. Located in the tranquil village of Lang Lang and perfectly positioned opposite a park for that extra peace and quiet, this gorgeous home offers:
- 2 good sized bedrooms plus a study
- Open plan kitchen & meals area with freestanding oven & stove in addition to a separate formal dining area
- Separate lounge featuring a cosy wood fire heater & split system air conditioning
- Not one, but 2 outdoor decked entertainment areas to choose from
- Single carport, secure rear yard, garden shed
Further complimenting the home is the ideal location, being within walking distance to the heart of the village & all the amenities and facilities on offer including shops, brewery, Lang Lang Primary School, public transport & with easy access to Westernport Highway and other major road arterials. Don't wait - call Matt Dewan on 0416 638 019 or Brent Day on 0421 085 092 NOW to secure your inspection!

Description:
Town and Beach, Brilliantly Positioned
Stunning, brand-new feel lifestyle property with functional floor plan, with high-end modern fixtures and finishes. This truly coveted position within an easy walk to the beach and just a few meters from the thriving main street of Grantville township including shops, cafes, convenience stores.
Double lock-up garage, off-street parking, secure boat parking, solar panels.
The home offers:
2 Bedrooms have BIRs and 1 without and carpet throughout all the bedrooms, shared bathroom
Master bedroom offers ensuite, WIR
Open plan living, bamboo flooring, window shutters throughout, wood heater, reverse cycle aircon.
Flowing from the kitchen, dining and living area and an expansive, closed in alfresco area with water views to enjoy summer and winter, great entertainer.
Please call Tamara or Daniel for an inspection.
Please note: photo ID is required for all inspections

Description:
The Perfect Getaway
Looking for a weekend retreat? A holiday home or Air bnb? A great first home, or a smart investment property? All of these things will work here. This home will tick the boxes for many with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, generous open plan kitchen, living and dining, double remote garage, secure rear yard on a 639sqm (approx) block all walking distance to the town and the beach.
The home is neat and tidy and features polished timber flooring throughout, a large open plan lounge room, dining and kitchen. The kitchen has a 600mm free standing stove, dishwasher and lots of storage. The highlight of the area being a beautiful open fire, with rendered surround and feature storage for logs. A split system heater/air conditioner ensures year-round comfort.
All 3 bedrooms are well-sized and have built-in robes, complemented by a bright and functional family bathroom.
Outside is a large and secure, fully-fenced back yard with remote double garage and additional garden shed.
Summer is a breeze, on the big rear deck - perfect for bbq-ing entertaining friends or relaxing after work in privacy. Double doors open from the dining area out onto the deck, creating the perfect inside/outside entertaining space.
Please note: Photo ID required for all inspections

Description:
BRAND NEW 4 BEDROOM HOME - FIRST HOME BUYERS GRANT APPLIES
Chic city upgrades with the finest rural outlook await just one lucky purchaser! Will it be YOU?
This sleek home comprises 4 generous sized bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (dual vanity ensuite to master) plus 3 toilets, raised ceilings (stylishly vaulted on entry) and gleaming porcelain tiling that leads you to the rear of the home where calming paddock views await. Family sized accommodation provides 2 living areas, with the impressive kitchen providing waterfall stone bench, walk in pantry, 900mm cooker and dishwasher adjoining the expansive family living area. The home is further complemented with ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Got a trailer/boat/truck? No worries!! This sensational property offers 2 DRIVEWAYS with genuine side access providing all the parking you could need.
All the boxes are ticked and inspection will not disappoint - but be quick!
Within walking distance to the heart of the village & all the amenities and facilities on offer including shops, Howler boutique brewery/restaurant, Lang Lang Primary School, public transport & with easy access to the Highway - IT JUST DOESN'T GET BETTER THAN THIS!
Internal area
208m²

Description:
Stunning Brand New Family Home
Here is your opportunity to secure a brand new 4 bedroom house and land package for the family. This fabulous home is light & bright with a fabulous colour palette. It offers a separate theatre room or formal lounge, an amazing open plan Kitchen/dining & large living. The kitchen has a great Island bench, 900mm electric stove top & oven and a large fully shelved walk in pantry. There are 4 bedrooms, master with a large walk-in-robe, full ensuite including double sinks. There's Split system air conditioning & this home is fully insulated with direct internal access to the double garage. There is an under roof line Alfresco area perfect for family BBQ's & entertaining, a good sized back yard with very pretty rural views. This wonderful property is tiled & carpeted through out, blinds, fly screens, clothesline + double remote garage all included. It's a turn key package, just bring the family!

Be Trendy Not Spendy
Why build when you can get everything you need in this modern as new home on a great 648m2 block. Once inside you will instantly fall in love with the open plan design and the warmth of neutral tones with timber floating floors and quality carpets throughout. At the formal end of the home you have a generous master bedroom with ensuite / WIR plus a cosy lounge to sit and relax. Most of your living however will be done in the huge family area of home which boasts a designer kitchen with butler's pantry, caesar stone bench tops and quality appliances. Add to all these 3 other bedrooms with robes and you have plenty of room for all the family to enjoy.

Description:
Perfect Beach Front Property
Set on a 517m2 block (approx.) in a quiet location right on the beach, this low maintenance light filled 3 bedroom home is perfect for a family, retirement or holiday living.
Immerse yourself in the ultimate foreshore lifestyle every day and have the pleasure of fishing, catching the sunset while enjoying a meal on your own private entertaining area, or just take a stroll along the beach and enjoy the peace and quiet of this location.
This immaculately presented home boasts a master bedroom with a walk in robe and ensuite, while the remaining 2 bedrooms have built in robes and easy access to the second bathroom with a separate toilet. The open plan living and dining area that opens up onto the huge under cover area makes it a great place for entertaining all your friends and family. The kitchen is equipped with an electric oven and cooktop, a dishwasher, pantry, and an abundance of bench and cupboard space.
You can access the garage internally through the laundry that has plenty of storage space. Through the garage there is back access into the back yard to park your trailers, caravan, boat etc. Dont miss out, enquire today!

Description:
THE PERFECT HOLIDAY HOME!
Make this your home away from home! This property offers a chance to enjoy the dream of holidays by the water with your family, or the perfect little renovator for the astute investor, perhaps a challenge for the first home buyer? Whatever your buying needs, this property will tick boxes!
Situated on the elevated end of Grantville, the property overlooks rural land to the North and South, Westernport Bay is at the end of the street, our areas greatest tourism attraction Maru Koala Park is a short walk from your doorstep, the bus stop is there as well! The local primary school and child care centre is only 5 minutes away!
This home has been a much loved and enjoyed 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom and 1 huge living room holiday house! Whilst it doesn't have all the bells and whistles you might find further down the road, it does have the bones of a well built, solid home which is on stumps, has aluminium windows, the bedrooms are huge at approximately 4.5m square, the lounge has two sliding doors leading to the side yard and the kitchen/dining end of the home opens out to the rear which has a lovely aspect overlooking the neighbouring paddock with dam.
This property is ready for you to continue in its use as the perfect holiday escape, or just as much as an open book ready for you to put your stamp on it!
Contact the team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection on 5678 8433!

Description:
Titled Land ready to build
Phone Enquiry ID- 80689
Located in the township of Lang Lang, just off the South Gippsland Highway in the recently established Summerfields Estate, lies a 677m2 residential block of land which is titled and ready to build on. The driveway crossover is completed with all services already connected to the boundary line. This property is close to schools and ammenitites with easy access into Melbourne CBD via the South Gippsland Highway

Description:
A BEAUTY IN BASS!
This approximate quarter acre parcel of land won't last long!
Situated in the ever popular quiet township of Bass. This block is only a hop over the road to the local football and netball club, a short stroll down the quiet street to the General Store, Op Shop, Landcare and Community Centre. Don't forget to drop the kids at the school bus stops or utilise the V-Line service which stops here as well!
Not just a pretty face, this block of land is priced to sell in the current market!
Call us today to arrange your inspection on 5678 8433.

Description:
BEACH COTTAGE BY THE BAY
Delightful opportunity to purchase an entry level beach cottage close to the Grantville foreshore! Situated on an approx. 541m2 block of residential land in Malcolm Drive is this compact 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home with an open layout kitchen/living zone. The home features timber floorboards which line majority of the homes floor and an open fire place. Entering the property there are two driveways, one leads to the single carport and the other leading to the shed.
This home is a great investment prospect, currently tenanted at $200p/w.
Please call the friendly team at Alex Scott and Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection on 5678 8433

Description:
It's All About The Location!!
Looking for the perfect place to build your dream home in a quiet court location?
Only metres from the water and coastal walking tracks in Corinella this approx. 810m2 offers potential water views with the right build, and is ideally situated for the discerning buyer wanting the lifestyle that living near the Bay can offer.
Everything in Corinella is within walking distance from this property, including post office/general store, community centre, bowls club and the newly opened Fig and The Bay café. The 24 hour boat ramp and jetty are two minutes' drive, Catering for the keen fisherman of the family. The local Primary School, Day Care Centre and dual lane highway are all within 5 minutes' drive, making it easy for commuting to the CBD or shopping precincts at Grantville and Wonthaggi.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 2000

Description:
APPROX 35 FROM CRANBOURNE WITH WATER VIEWS 41 ACRES
Spacious family brick veneer home, master with full ensuite, other remaining 3 bedrooms with generous sized built in robes. Kitchen with water views looking over the glorious paddocks, large living area plus formal lounge. Double garage under roof line, two great sized outdoor entertaining areas perfect for entertaining all year round.
Ideal for horses or cattle, A self contained unit with a bedroom , bathroom, kitchen & living area and garden shed.
50Ft x 25Ft shed, a tack room unit, large separate garage, 3 Bay shed, dams, bore with windmill, troughs, central laneway, stockyards with crush and loading race, excellent fencing.
In close proximity to local schools, cafes and shopping centres with a new boat ramp coming to Corinella in late September 2019 there's really no need to look any further. Offering leafy tranquillity, an abundance of space and shady paddock to keep your horses, this homestead represents the epitome of rural peace. Contact Matt Dewan on 0416 638 019 or Brent Day on 0421 085 092 today to book an appointment.
Insights: 35 Motton Road, The Gurdies VIC 3984 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
AMAZING VIEWS ON APPROX 833 SQUARE METRES
Stop looking! We have found you the perfect home set in a beautiful, peaceful location, only a short walk to all the amenities that Grantville has to offer. The home has stunning views of Westernport Bay from the wide west facing deck, living room and the master bedroom!
This two-bedroom vertical pine home is extremely well presented and offers cathedral ceilings, wood heating, 3 x Split system units, 18 x Solar panels, ceiling fans in both bedrooms and living zone, family bathroom with separate toilet, sliding door onto the deck with four person spa, open plan kitchen/dining/living area and sunroom off the master bedroom.
Externally you will find a double carport with power and concrete drive, an easily maintained garden with many mature roses, a vegetable patch which gets the perfect amount of sunlight and a great size garden shed. There is also a bonus workshop with power as well as other storage areas under the house.
Please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott and Staff today on 5678 8433 to arrange your inspection!
Insights: 2 Agnes Street, Grantville VIC 3984 was last sold in 2019 and 5 other 2 bedroom house in Grantville have recently been sold.

Description:
AWAITING A RADICAL TRANSFORMATION!
Sitting on approximately 1400 square meters of land, is this modest 2 bedroom 1 bathroom beach house. The home sits to the rear of the block and takes in views across the pasture of neighbouring farmland. Scattered through the backyard are mature shrubs which are just waiting the creative eye to make the most of their form and create some magic here. The front drive lends itself to improvement however the whole property offers a blank template for you to start your dream!
Whether you are looking to leave a small footprint or expand to something larger, this property ticks the boxes!
Don't wait around, get in quick to view this entry level property!
